Manual', 'Scroll to top of page to view video', 'Customize Your Clean', 'With Oral-B Professional Care 4000, you can customize your routine with a variety of Oral-B replacement heads:', 'Oral-B Floss Action', '• Advanced cleaning deep between teeth• Features soft MicroPulse bristles', 'Oral-B Precision Clean', '• Cleaner teeth, healthier gums', '(vs. a regular manual toothbrush)', '• Features more cleaning bristles and superior tooth cupping', '(vs. original Precision Clean)', 'Oral-B Pro White', '• Advanced cleaning and whitening• Features dentist-inspired polishing cup', 'Oral-B Dual Clean', '• Breaks up and sweeps away plaque• Features two moving heads', 'Oral-B Sensitive Clean', '• Gentle, effective cleaning• Features extra soft bristles', 'Subscribe & Save', 'Save 15% on replacement brush heads with Subscribe & Save', 'Don’t forget to replace your brush heads. Join Subscribe & Save and save 15% PLUS get free shipping.', 'Sign up today to automatically receive new replacement brush heads in the intervals you select.', 'Buy These Products and Related Accessories', 'Crest Pro-Health ToothpasteCrest Pro-Health Rinse', 'Change Your Brush', 'Dentists recommend a new brush every season.'] {'Product Dimensions': '11.63 x 9.63 x 3.5 inches; 1.75 Pounds', 'Item model number': 'SmartSeries 4000', 'Batteries': '2 AA batteries required.', 'UPC': '069055866030', 'Manufacturer': 'Braun'} Unbeatable! The next best thing to going to your dental hygenist daily. I have been using the same one for 10 years, never needed to buy a new one. I switch the brush out every 3 months or so. I can still remember the epic difference between my regular toothbrush and this. a small amount of toothpaste does a great job. Worth Every Penney, do yourself a favor and get one today. worth every penney Royal Locks Curl Rescue Leave in Conditioner | Curly Hair Therapy | Keravis Ultra Conditioning Formula | 4 Oz Royal Locks {'Brand': 'Royal Locks', 'Material Feature': 'Paraben Free', 'Hair Type': 'Frizzy, Curly, Thick, Damaged', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Unit Count': '4 Fl Oz', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '2 x 3 x 5 inches; 4 Ounces', 'UPC': '651536096977'} This is the real deal. Designed for naturally curly, wavy or grey hair, or any hair type that needs deep conditioning. I have 50 year old curly highlighted Irish hair. My styist actually noticed how soft it felt and controllable it looked. The product calls it Curl Rescue with Keravis Ultra Conditioning Formula for Curls. No Sulfate or paraben; alcohol & cruelty free. With keratin and Vitamin B5.

It is doubled packaged inside a mylar container to control any spill in transit. Leave in Conditioner for Curly Hair Therapy by Royal Locks Water Flosser Cordless Teeth Cleaner, SOOCAS Professional Oral Irrigator 230ML Portable and Rechargeable Water Dental Flosser with 3 Modes and 4 Jet Tips, IPX7 Waterproof, USB Charged for 30 Days Use SOOCAS {'Brand': 'SOOCAS', 'Power Source': 'Battery Powered', 'Special Feature': 'Por, Multiple Operation Modes, Multiple Tips', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Tank Volume': '230 Milliliters', 'Package Dimensions': '9.49 x 4.41 x 3.23 inches; 1.08 Pounds', 'Item model number': 'SOOCAS W3', 'Manufacturer': 'SOOCAS'} The Removable/detachable Water Tank is not removable nor detachable. I studied the user manual and no mention on how to remove it so you can clean it.

It doesn't come with an adapter so unless you have an extra you will be charging with your laptop. FYI will not operate while charging.

The full water tank lasts for 50 seconds of continuous flossing.

A Full battery will last 30 minutes before needing a recharge. Charging time:4-6 Hours. Charging voltage:5V.
Cleaning modes are gentle/standard/pulse massage. High pressure water pulse, 20-140PSI water pressure. ** Make sure to not lose the little white tab that covers the charger port - you'll need it to keep it waterproof. Cordless Water Flosser, USB Rechargeable, 3-Mode, 4 different Jet Tips by SOOCAS W3 Aloe Vera Gel 100% Natural Moisturisers - Pure Organic Fresh Soothing Aloe-Vera Moisturizing Gel Skin Hair, Aloe Leaf Wash-free Clean After Sun Face Body (8.8 oz) CIMIY {'Brand': 'CIMIY', 'Scent': 'Aloe Vera', 'Item Form': 'Gel', 'Unit Count': '8.8 Fl Oz', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Product Dimensions': '5.91 x 1.57 x 1.57 inches; 11.22 Ounces'} It's like having your own Aloe plant in a bottle because the first ingredient is Aloe. We do have an Aloe plant in our home. The bonus is the vitamin E and Hyaluronic Acid (improves skin elasticity). This works great on sunburn!!!

In a pinch you can use this and mix with isopropyl alcohol (30/70 mix) and make hand sanitizer.

This really well packaged to prevent leakage in transit and you can reuse it to keep little fingers from depressing the product. Not just organic Iryasa Night Indulge Cream - Natural Face Cream for Dry Skin - Vegan Anti Aging Night Cream for Women - Firming Cream for Face and Neck - Organic Vitamin C Moisturizer for Face - 1.7oz IRYASA {'Brand': 'IRYASA', 'Item Form': 'Cream', 'Unit Count': '1.7 Ounce', 'Use for': 'Face', 'Skin Type': 'Mature', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '2.76 x 2.76 x 2.2 inches; 1.76 Ounces'} I smell like furniture polish, it was piercingly unpleasant. Did not like the scent at all
profile:
**User Summary:**

This user showcases a robust preference for high-quality grooming products that prioritize effectiveness and meet specific needs. Their loyalty to brands providing innovative solutions is evident in their long-term use of an electric toothbrush. They emphasize oral care, focusing on deep cleaning capability and gentle treatment of gums, reflecting a commitment to comprehensive dental hygiene.

Recently, the user expanded their interest to hair care, specifically seeking products catered to curly hair that emphasize deep conditioning and natural ingredients, free from harsh chemicals. Their positive experiences with hair products, including a leave-in conditioner, illustrate their desire for effective hair management.

The user has also indicated a keen interest in natural skincare solutions. However, their recent experience with a night cream was less favorable, as they reported being dissatisfied with the scent, which impacted their overall impression. This suggests a discerning taste and a desire for products that not only perform well but also provide a pleasant sensory experience.

Valuing longevity and sustainable performance, the user appreciates ongoing recommendations for user-friendly personal care products. Their consistent five-star ratings highlight their discerning nature, complemented by a willingness to offer critical feedback for underwhelming items. This user is likely to continue seeking top-notch grooming and skincare products that embody quality and innovative design while maintaining a holistic approach to their personal care routine.
